name: opening_contrast
prompt: EXT. CITY PARK — DAWN. Dew-glazed grass, golden rays filtering through oak branches. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: private_hesitation
prompt: INT. ALEX'S APARTMENT — MORNING. Sunlight through sheer curtains, wooden desk. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: dual_isolation
prompt: SPLIT SCREEN. Alex at desk, Jamie in bedroom, intimate character voices. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: emotional_visualization
prompt: GRAPHIC INSERT. Glowing waveform animates from deep blue to amber. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: jamie_turn
prompt: INT. COFFEE SHOP. Jamie's reflection in glass, phone to ear. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: phases_motion
prompt: MONTAGE. Multiple panels showing the five-phase process. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: reunion
prompt: EXT. LAKESIDE DOCK — GOLDEN HOUR. Alex and Jamie approach from opposite ends. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: agreement_touch
prompt: CLOSE-UP. Hands meet on table, candlelight flickering. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: ripple_connection
prompt: QUICK CUTS. Friends laughing, colleagues shaking hands, family conversation. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality

name: final_promise
prompt: EXT. DOCK — SUNSET. Silhouetted figures, text overlays, logo reveal. Cinematic, therapeutic atmosphere, warm lighting, professional quality
